title: [Large-Scale] Motivation-Based Continuing Professional Development (CPD) Design Workshop for Medical Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Over 5 years of practical experience in the medical field, with competency in basic statistics and data analysis
context.additional_context: Building a case-based learning environment to strengthen the connection between current practitioners' work and learning

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four elements of the PACE model (Purpose, Autonomy, Confidence, Engagement) to Continuing Professional Development (CPD) program design
Learners can propose at least three blended learning strategies to enhance learners' intrinsic motivation
Learners can design practical problem-solving approaches using mathematical modeling techniques in medical data analysis
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
